body.name: Thermal Grizzly - Kryonaut Extreme - 33.84 Gram/9 ml - Extremly High Performance Thermal Paste - for Maximum Thermal Conductivity While Overclocking CPU/GPU/PS4/PS5/Xbox
body.stockDetail: Only 2 left in stock - order soon.
features: EXTREME HEAT CONDUCTIVITY - With a thermal conductivity of 14.2 W/(m·K), Kryonaut offers exceptional heat transfer, making it perfect for demanding configurations
EASY APPLICATION - The package includes a syringe and a specially designed applicator for effortless paste distribution
LONG-LASTING EFFECT - Kryonaut's unique structure ensures long-term eectiveness, remaining stable even at temperatures up to 80 degrees Celsius
IMPRESSIVE RESULTS - Experience an immediate temperature drop, reduced noise levels, and improved user comfort with this thermal solution
TOP PERFORMANCE - Backed by extensive testing, Kryonaut meets the highest quality standards, catering to both standard computer users and passionate overclocking enthusiasts
body.description: About Kryonaut extreme thermal grease Thermal Grizzly's Kryonaut Extreme is an improved version of their Kryonaut paste, with the highest thermal conductivity achieved through the use of smaller particles, a thinner minimum layer height, and improved low-temperature application. Technical Details Thermal Conductivity: 14.2 W/mkElectrical Conductivity: 0 pS/mViscosity: 130-180 PasSpecific Weight: 3,76g/cm3Temperature: -250 °C / +350 °CCapacity: 2g | 33,84g/9ml

productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 4.2 4.2 out of 5 stars 36 ratings 4.2 out of 5 stars

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Thermal Grizzly Kryonaut extreme Characteristics designed for Overclocking excellent thermal conductivity long-lasting durability no curing no electrical conductivity About Kryonaut extreme thermal grease Thermal Grizzly's Kryonaut Extreme is an improved version of their Kryonaut paste, with the highest thermal conductivity achieved through the use of smaller particles, a thinner minimum layer height, and improved low-temperature application. Technical Details Thermal Conductivity: 14.2 W/mkElectrical Conductivity: 0 pS/mViscosity: 130-180 PasSpecific Weight: 3,76g/cm3Temperature: -250 °C / +350 °CCapacity: 2g | 33,84g/9ml

Extremely powerful structure Thermal Grizzly's Kryonaut Extreme is a highly effective thermal grease, specifically designed for cryogenic environments, where it delivers peak performance during extreme overclocking with liquid nitrogen. The inclusion of aluminum oxide nanoparticles, combined with an enhanced application process, make Kryonaut Extreme our top-of-the-line offering. Working in collaboration with leading engineers and overclockers, we have ensured that Kryonaut Extreme performs exceptionally well in ambient applications such as water cooling, as well as in extreme scenarios such as liquid nitrogen cooling.

Great compatibility Compatible with almost all cooling solutions, including air, water, and even liquid nitrogen (up to -250°C). Compatibilities PS3, PS4, PS5 Xbox 360, One, Series S, Series X CPU, GPU, LEDs Heat dissipation fins and fans Laptops, Macbooks

For the true "Kryonauts" amongst the "extreme overclockers" The term "Kryo," derived from the Greek word for "cold," is also used in the German word for "cryoengineering." This implies that the thermal grease may have been specifically designed for use in cryogenic applications.

Scope of delivery Kryonaut extreme thermal grease A container of Thermal Grizzly Kryonaut extreme containing 33.84 gramms of thermal grease. Spatula Tree spatulas specifically designed to evenly spread the grease. Box A sturdy box with notches perfect to store the kryonaut extreme thermal grease.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Noticeably less heat from my cpu
reviews.reviewText: Title says it all! My CPU is not generating much heat as before anymore as this thermal grizzly extreme helps with transferring all the heat to my water cooler. Its amazing!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Extreme Performance Best Value
reviews.reviewText: I work with computers often, when I did the math of the price of this vs the 2 grams versions, THIS is the best value per gram, period. I use it for CPU and GPUs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars It works but the container is VERY small
reviews.reviewText: The thermal paste performs exactly as described.... you just don't get much of it. The container's base is about the same circumference as a US Quarter Dollar. It is about as tall as 10 quarters. There just isn't much here.
Très très bonne pâte, je recommande vivement en tant que réparateur informatique pour l'overclocking a l'extrême ;-)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on October 1, 2021
reviews.reviewText: Excellent paste for gpu or cpu, is very expensive which may put some people off but temps have been very good using it

Very expensive, and does the same as the Arctic MX5 or MX6 (depends on the configuration), which I use for many years. The first and last time I would buy this product. I read many reviews that it deteriorate quickly, so you have to re-apply more than the Arctic. If you have a hard tube water cooling, this isn't the paste for you. It comes in a nice box, but that's all I have to say of it.
